value:
$WmMPID_ナレーション,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|Approximately one year before
Niðavellir's invasion of Askr...$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Fáfnir and Reginn are still
oblivious to our little plan,
I take it?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Of course. They're preoccupied
with Gullinbursti upkeep for the
time being.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Excellent. Let's get on with the
test, then.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Does this attempt seem any more
likely to succeed? I'd rather not have
to clean up corpses again.$k$pThis experiment of yours, trying
to recreate Askr's divine weapon,
Breidablik...$k$pThough you've demonstrated your
ability to bring Heroes here from
other worlds...$k$pThus far, they have all lost their
minds and been reduced to ruin.$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|That or their memory is wiped
clean and they wander the land,
failing to fulfill their purpose, yes.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Are you referring...to Fáfnir?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Never mind. You can trust I have
made adjustments that should
increase our chances of success.$k$pHeroes from other worlds are not
always of stable body and mind.
There are so many worlds, you see.$k$pThe occurrence or non-occurrence of
specific events can drastically alter
their personalities.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|What are you getting at?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile2|If our problem is that Heroes we
summon lose their minds and
their usefulness...$k$pI thought, why not summon Heroes
who have already lost their minds?
Perhaps they'll remain useful!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|And does your solution keep them
from losing their memories as well?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Smile|In theory. They'll keep the important
memories, at any rate—like how to
best crush our enemies.$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|That's all well and good, but how
will we control them if they have
indeed lost their minds?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Cool|We can't know until we try. That is
the nature of experimentation! Now
ready yourself. We're about to begin!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMPID_催眠ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Dark01,Face|Hrgh... Wh-where am I?$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ味方,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|This place does not look to be Hel...$k$p$WmMPID_闇リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Dark01,Face|I can no longer feel King Anankos's
presence. What vile sorcery is this?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|They've managed to keep some
semblance of their sanity, it seems.
Has our summoning...succeeded?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face|Greetings, Heroes. I am Eitri, and this
is Niðavellir. You have been brought
here from other worlds.$k$pNow, state your names for us,
if you would.$k$p$WmMPID_暴走レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Dark01,Face|I am...Rhea. I am...archbishop of the
Church of Seiros...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Smile|If they remember their names, that
is better than we've done before...
Did your tinkering actually work?$k$p$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Hm... Something isn't right.$k$p$WmMPID_催眠ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Dark01,Face|Stay...stay away from me... Guh...
GYAAAHHH!$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Sh-she's transformed into
a gigantic dragon!$k$p$WmMPID_催眠ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Dark01,Face|NYAAAH!$k$p$WmMPID_暴走レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Dark01,Face|I must not...use this power rashly!
I must...not...$k$pThose who resist... Enemies of
the church... All shall— Hrk!
N-no! I must stay...strong... I must—$k$p$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$WmMEID_エイトリ,ch00_35_Eitri_F_Normal,Face_Cool|A-another dragon? What are the
chances of that, I wonder...$k$p$WmMPID_催眠ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Dark01,Face|Stay back! I don't want...to hurt you!$k$p$WmMPID_暴走レア,ch17_37_Rare_F_Dark01,Face|All who would stand in my path must
be destroyed! GRAAAGH!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|They're already at each other's
throats! Eitri, this is getting out
of hand!$k$p$WmMPID_グスタフ味方,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Enemy,Face|What raw power... We may be forced
to engage them.$k$p$WmMPID_闇リリス,ch05_53_Lilith_F_Dark01,Face|"We"? Speak for yourself. My only
goal is to return to the side of
King Anankos.$k$p
